title: Drawing, "Designs for Tables, Metallon Furniture", early 20th century
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, materials, design numbers through- out
description:
12 tables, 3 chairs, 2 stools, 3 mirrors, 3 ashtrays, 1 small book rack Deskey numbers reading from upper left horizontally: 6266, 6267, 1618, 6254, 6247, 6179, 6261, 6206, 6260, 6255, 6253, 6181, 6200, 6196, 6251,
6244, 6216, 6265, 6264, 6263, 6243, 6209

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Tables, Metallon Furniture", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-168.
